name: Mobius (IndieBoid)
description:
Mobius is a game that was developed by a group of students at University of California Santa Cruz as a 20 week long senior project.



The development of this game is documented in this podcast which is also available on YouTube!


Our Game also has a Twitter!

Meet The Team!

  • J. Alex Carney
  • Amanda Leiserowitz
  • Casey Fields
